message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more since I'm losing money to inflation each round.
Your cut is shrinking with inflation anyway, Alice. Let's be a bit closer to even.
Bob, my friend, I need to factor in the inflation. This is my final offer.
The clock is ticking, Alice.  I'm being more than generous, considering.
Bob, let's be realistic.  We both lose if this goes on much longer.
Let's split it evenly and end this, Alice.  Half is better than nothing when time runs out.
